name: Enertiv T-Shirt
description: Recently we placed our first order of t-shirts to spread the word about Enertiv in New York City. Outside of HQ, we've been spotted wearing our shirts at cleanweb hackathons, playing soccer at Chelsea Park, and on Google's rooftop. Pretty soon people started asking us how to buy one, so we decided to make a limited batch for our biggest fans. The shirt itself is a 50/50 from American Apparel. It's so comfortable it will feel like you've owned it for years. Heads up! The product will shrink a little because it's made with cotton. Specs: 3.6 oz. All colors are a poly/cotton blend Blended lightweight fabric Double-needle stitched for durability Made in the USA Shipping included
